short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your productivity with this Chrome extension. It blocks distractions, improves focus, and helps manage your time at work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of getting distracted by social media or news sites while working? Let Me Work helps you stay focused by letting you block specific websites during your work hours.

Simply add the sites you want to block, activate the extension, and enjoy uninterrupted focus time. Whether you're working from home or in the office, "Let Me Work" is the perfect productivity companion.

Features:

1. Customizable Blocklist – You decide which websites to block.
2. One-click Activation – Easily toggle the extension on or off as needed.
3. Distraction-free Focus – Stay in control and maximize your work efficiency.
4. Simple Interface – Easy setup with a clean and intuitive interface.

Why Install?

1. Boost Productivity – Eliminate distractions and get more done.
2. Stay Focused – Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone looking to improve focus.
3. Control Your Time – Set boundaries between work and play by limiting access to time-wasting sites.

Install "Let Me Work" today and take control of your workday!
